definition: to abuse one's position for personal gain (idiom)
variant of 徇[xun4]
to give in to/to be swayed by (personal considerations etc)/Taiwan pr. [xun2]/to follow/to expose publicly/variant of 侚[xun4]/variant of 殉[xun4]
personal/private/selfish
to dance/to wield/to brandish
detriment/fraud/harm/defeat

sentences.english: Investigation of fraud was their commission.
Practicing favoritism, when found, when abolition of school.
sentences.chinese: 徇私舞弊者，何时查出，何时取消学籍。

sentences.english: Higher mistaken rate and irregularities for favoritism are often produced.
sentences.chinese: 错案率高，徇私舞弊现象时有发生等。
